com.nijikokun.register.payment
Interface Method

All Known Implementing Classes:
BOSE6, BOSE7, EE17, iCo4, iCo5, iCo6, MCUR
public interface Method

Interface to be implemented by a payment method.

Author:
Nijikokun (@nijikokun)

Method Detail

getPlugin

Object getPlugin()
Encodes the Plugin into an Object disguised as the Plugin. If you want the original Plugin Class you must cast it to the correct Plugin, to do so you have to verify the name and or version then cast. 
  if(method.getName().equalsIgnoreCase("iConomy"))
   iConomy plugin = ((iConomy)method.getPlugin());

Returns:
Object
See Also:
getName(), getVersion()

getName

String getName()
Returns the actual name of this method.

Returns:
String Plugin name.

String getVersion()
Returns the actual version of this method.

Returns:
String Plugin version.

fractionalDigits

int fractionalDigits()
Returns the amount of decimal places that get stored NOTE: it will return -1 if there is no rounding

Returns:
int for each decimal place
